abilities.name: Queen’s Call
abilities.effect: Once during your turn (before your attack), you may search your deck for a Pokémon that isn’t a Pokémon-GX or Pokémon-EX, reveal it, and put it into your hand. Then, shuffle your deck.

attacks.name: Power Lariat
attacks.effect: This attack does 50 more damage for each Evolution Pokémon on your Bench.
